chara.textHome:
My parents died when I was still young.
It was a car accident during a trip...
I was left all on my own.

My relatives passed me around,
and eventually I ended up in an
orphanage called the Azalea House...
But that turned out to be my lucky break!
I found a whole new family!

As soon as I find a weakness in my
opponent, I won't leave it alone.
Maybe that's playing dirty?
That's what it takes to lead, though.
Yeah, I can tell how I'm moving up
It's crystal clear.
Whew... That feels nice.
Like I've got a new perspective!

Ever since my parents died and I became
an orphan, I started paying really close
attention to how people around me act.
Which leads us to this moment here.

I say I pay close attention to people,
but if you're literally staring at them
all the time they'll get defensive.

That's why you have to pick up the details
and arrange it into the full picture
in just two blinks of the eye.
Oh, you're here.
How's it going?
Yeah, I'm not too bad either.
Anyway, let's take it easy today, huh?

Mmph... Oh...good morning...
Nah, on second thought,
I'm going back to sleep...
I'm just really bad at waking up...
Just give me...five more minutes...

I'm not totally awake at this time of day.
I wonder if eating something
spicy would wake me up.
Maybe curry? Or hot noodles?

All right, I might go for
a stroll around town...
Oh, but not for fun, you know.

It's my Magical Girl patrol...and
maybe just a little bit of fun!

Hm... I don't think I'll be getting
my homework done today.
Guess I'll get up early tomorrow.

What? Of course, I'll be fine!
I'm telling you, I can wake up, no problem!

I can never tell whether
time is going slow or fast.
It feels like both, you know?

Maybe it depends on how you're
feeling and what's happening.

There's only so much you
can do by yourself.
That's why I focus on the role given to me.

There's no point overdoing something
when it's not your job, after all.
Geeze, I guess we gotta fight...
But I don't intend to lose, by the way.
I'm ready to go, so let's do it.

Sometimes you can tell what
another person is feeling, right?

I mean, you can't tell exactly.
But you do get the gist of it.

When the weather's nice, I like to sit on
the river bank and completely zone out.
Just stare off into space...
It totally clears my head

I don't usually go out of my way for
good food, but I don't mind waiting
in long lines at stores.

I mean, I get excited just thinking
about what tasty stuff they have!

There are things in life that you just
can't do anything about, right?

This is gonna sound obvious, but no reason
to sweat it if you can't make any difference.

I wonder how many Magical Girls
there are in this town.
It'd be great if they were all nice to me.
But I guess that's impossible...
There're always two sides to every story.

You think you always know which side
you're looking at, but sometimes it's
the opposite.
Even just thinking about it is annoying...

I might take a walk around
Kamihama when I have time.
There seem to be lots of cool places here.
Maybe all three of us can go together.

To me, surviving in this world with Konoha
and Ayame is the most important thing.
I'd put them first over anything else.
I found it...
the perfect seasoning combination!
With this, I can make anything taste better!
Well, let's get started then!
And...finished! Cool, time to withdraw!
Come on, I couldn't possibly afford to lose.
Yes! We won! Things are looking good.
Sorry, we can't stop now.
Huh...me?
Oh, I'm Hazuki Yusa. Nice to meet you!

Uh...ah, right, would you like to
get something to drink?
My treat. You want coffee or something?
Well, this should be fine for now.
Not too bad, right?
There we go! Yeah, that's right.
I'm really feeling it.
It's like...a hidden passage just opened.
Anyway, let's keep going!

When I'm negotiating with someone
and they're the stubborn type,

I try to make some kind of opening
in the conversation...
kinda like getting your foot in a closing door.

Once I see a good opening in a negotiation,
I always come in with a really high-stakes
request.
Then I lower it depending on their reaction...
It makes it easier for them to swallow.
